sense.def:
Someone's subconscious
je del človekovega uma; ta lahko vpliva na človeka, ne da bi se človek tega zavedal.

seg.quote: The knowledge was there somewhere in the depths of his subconscious.

sense.def:
Kar je
subconscious
, se zgodi ali obstaja v naši podzavesti.

seg.quote: ...a fictional character with whom millions could subconsciously identify.
